Checkpoint 1

Complete the following tasks by adding to the StringTest class and show your TA your code. Refer to the documentation as needed.

  1. Print an uppercase version of message using the method toUpperCase.
  2. Use the method substring to extract just the first 5 characters ("Hello") from message and print it.
    3. Why are there two methods called "substring"?
    For one of them, you supply both the starting index and the ending index for the substring. In the other, you just supply the starting index and it takes all characters to the end of the string. Having two methods with the same name but different parameters is called method overloading.
  3. Print the result of using the method replace to substitute all instances of character 'o' with '*'.
